overview: Year 2000 Along with the most condensed cast of any previous TransWorld video, generator-powered night footage and a highly synthesized soundtrack set Modus Operandi apart from other videos of its time. Directed and edited by Ty Evans and Jon Holland, parts featured Marc Johnson’s “pure thought turned reality” and dramatic slow mos from Chany Jeanguenin and the Expedition crew.  Brian Anderson, Chany Jeanguenin, Marc Johnson, Mike Caroll
title: Modus Operandi - Transworld
